snippet: Creative Artists filed suit against United Artists, a smaller rival, for recruiting 10 of its agents in what it called a “lawless, midnight raid.”
abstract: Creative Artists Agency files suit against United Talent Agency for recruiting 10 of its agents; surprise defection, one of biggest in Hollywood history, takes lucrative comedy operation from Creative Artists and portrays it as weak.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY

lead_paragraph: Creative Artists filed suit against United Artists, a smaller rival, for recruiting 10 of its agents in what it called a “lawless, midnight raid.”

headline.main: In Hollywood, A-List Talent Agencies Battle Over Departure of Agents
headline.print_headline: In Hollywood, A-List Talent Agencies Battle Over Departure of Agents
